pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer

Class ChangeAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.ChangeAnalyzer

  • public class ChangeAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    ChangeAnalyzer is the main class of this project. It provides the following functions:
    • Extract data from a repository
    • Read extracted data from an ARFF file
    • Save extracted data to an ARFF file
    • Classify instances (methods) with missing class attrribute
    Classification is printed in the form of tab-separated records containing method headers and bug-proneness scores.
    Author:
    Adam Wierzbicki

    • Method Detail

      • wrapClassifier

        private void wrapClassifier(weka.classifiers.Classifier classifier)
        Wrap the given classifier in a FilteredClassifier. This removes all String attributes from instances before putting them into the wrapped classifier.
        Parameters:
        classifier - Classifier to be wrapped

      • classifyMethods

        public void classifyMethods()
                     throws ChangeAnalyzerException
        Classify methods lacking class attribute (from the previously etcracted or read data). Prior to calling this method, extractData(File) or readData(File) should be invoked, otherwise an IllegalStateException will be thrown.
        Throws:
        ChangeAnalyzerException

      • saveResults

        public void saveResults(java.io.File resultFile)

        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getResults

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getResults()

        Returns:
